job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Cloud/Data Engineer you will work on two of our most important tracks:
   Development of a data science platform that other teams can use (based on AzureML) &
   Supporting our data scientists in the development of AI use cases & Experiments.

   You have daily contact with the rest of the team and you like to work in an interdisciplinary environment. We really bring the worlds of Engineering and Data Science together.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Cloud Data Engineer

As a Cloud/Data Engineer you will work on two of our most important tracks:
   Development of a data science platform that other teams can use (based on AzureML) &
   Supporting our data scientists in the development of AI use cases & Experiments.

   You have daily contact with the rest of the team and you like to work in an interdisciplinary environment. We really bring the worlds of Engineering and Data Science together.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on data engineering and supporting data scientists, rather than the core development or fine-tuning of generative AI models. While it mentions AI use cases, the primary emphasis is on platform development and infrastructure within AzureML, aligning more with traditional data engineering and MLOps.

phrases: Development of a data science platform
Supporting our data scientists in the development of AI use cases & Experiments
job_tasks.justification: The role involves building and maintaining a data science platform and supporting data scientists, which directly relates to data infrastructure and pipeline development.
AzureML is a platform that encompasses MLOps capabilities for managing the lifecycle of machine learning models, indicating a focus on operational aspects.

phrases: work on two of our most important tracks
Development of a data science platform that other teams can use
Supporting our data scientists in the development of AI use cases & Experiments
job_tasks.justification: The description highlights the strategic importance of the tracks and the goal of enabling other teams, indicating an understanding of business needs and how data science contributes to them.

phrases: You have daily contact with the rest of the team and you like to work in an interdisciplinary environment.
We really bring the worlds of Engineering and Data Science together.
Supporting our data scientists in the development of AI use cases & Experiments
